TextView.android:text: 2 Are the personal trained in the following
1 Please select the controls in place for working at Heights - High Banks, Weirs Etc., Fast/Deep Water.
2 Please select the controls you used if there is inadequate access due to steep river bank / a slippy river bank.
3 Is the work area barriered off?
4 What control methods are used if Hogweed is encountered on Site.
5 Please select the controls in place to ensure that adequate hygiene procedures are followed?
6 Please select the controls in place if working with / close to live traffic
Implement Traffic Management Plan (Record TMP number)
